main event: Local citizen reported sighting of two round, white objects moving together about four miles south of Delta Utah Airport in 1952.
interesting points: The objects were described as the size of baseballs, one on top of the other., The witness believed the sighting could have been a reflection of lights due to weather conditions., The sighting lasted for less than 10 seconds., An aircraft was reported to have passed over at the same time, which caused confusion., The area was difficult to search due to heavy sagebrush.
witness description: Local citizen, Robert D. Davis, and a partner of Robert Miller.
